# Search Guard Documentation

> Search Guard is an Enterprise Security Suite for Elasticsearch and OpenSearch, providing authentication, authorization, encryption, audit logging, and compliance features. Official documentation at https://docs.search-guard.com/latest/

Search Guard protects your Elasticsearch and OpenSearch clusters with a comprehensive security solution. It offers TLS encryption, multiple authentication methods (LDAP, Active Directory, Kerberos, JWT, SAML, OpenID Connect), fine-grained access control, Document-Level Security, Field-Level Security, audit logging, and compliance features.

This documentation covers all Search Guard features across Community and Enterprise editions, including the Signals Alerting plugin, Automated Index Management (AIM), Encryption at Rest, and Anomaly Detection modules.
